def_en: Tights are a piece of clothing, usually worn by women and girls. They are usually made of nylon and cover the hips, legs and feet.

def_cn: (通常指舞蹈演员、杂技演员或人们运动时穿的)紧身衣
def_en: Tights are a piece of tight clothing, usually worn by dancers, acrobats, or people in exercise classes, and covering the hips and each leg.
